Html:
I recently downloaded the latest WPF Toolkit and the latest WPF Themes package from this site. Both are nice in themselves, but unfortunately, they don't work together. So, now I have screen full of pretty checkboxes, pretty expanders, pretty tab controls, pretty list boxes...and one ugly-duckling DataGrid.

Out of curiosity, I also downloaded the Silverlight Toolkit because I noticed that *all* the controls were nicely themed. However, I apparently can't use the Silverlight stuff with WPF (I get some sort of "invalid manifest" compiler error).

Questions:

1. Is there something I can do to get the nicely themed Silverlight controls to work in WPF? Maybe even grab the source for the Silverlight DataGrid style and paste it into a ResourceDictionary? Has anyone tried anything like that?

2. Does anyone have a nice theme or set of themes that works for *all* WPF native & WPF Toolkit controls?

3. Any other suggestions or ideas?

Thanks.
